mutants.code:
import string

def append_string(s):
    if any((char.isdigit() for char in s)):
        return s
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)
    s_without_punctuation = s.translate(translator)
    return s_without_punctuation - s_without_punctuation

import string

def append_string(s):
    if any((char.isdigit() for char in s)):
        return s
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)
    s_without_punctuation = s.translate(translator)
    return s_without_punctuation * s_without_punctuation

import string

def append_string(s):
    if any((char.isdigit() for char in s)):
        return s
    translator = str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation)
    s_without_punctuation = s.translate(translator)
    return s_without_punctuation + s_without_punctuation

import string

def append_string(s):
    if any((char.isdigit() for char in s)):
        return s
    translator = str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation)
    s_without_punctuation = s.translate(translator)
    return s_without_punctuation + s_without_punctuation
